name: Crown
description: A stately crown created to ensure a well-meaning but ungifted heir could fend off usurpers and govern with a strong hand.
additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant the following additional stats:
48 mana, 0.2 mana regeneration and 0.4% flat base magic resistance.
4 main attack damage to all Strength/Agility/Intelligence heroes.
5.4 main attack damage to universal heroes.
